overview: Catfighting is at its lustful best in the second episode of SV's hot, adrenaline-fueled series. An inconsiderate Ariel X pushes studious beauty Samantha Ryan too far, and gets more than she bargained for. Meanwhile, demanding diva Mz. Berlin puts a terrified Trinity Post back in her play: naked in the busty redhead's bed. Nikita Denise uses tough love to teach young Mina Meow to be a better personal assistant, and Zoe Britton counters the passive-aggressive remarks of Elexis Monroe with a little old fashioned, down-and-dirty scrapping.
title: Rivals 2
